text: Sir Colin Murray Campbell (26 December 1944 â€“ 20 May 2022) was a Scottish lawyer and academic. He was the Vice Chancellor of the University of Nottingham. He retired as vice chancellor of the University of Nottingham in September 2008. He was appointed in 1988 as the country's youngest vice chancellor at the age of 43. Campbell died on 20 May 2022, aged 77.Tributes paid following the death of Nottingham's Former Vice Chancellor ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Scottish lawyers Category:Academics of the University of Nottingham Category:Scottish academics
title: Colin Campbell (lawyer)
